us.zoom.sdk

Interface InMeetingServiceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener

    public interface InMeetingServiceListener
extends us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener
    Zoom service listener in meeting.

    • Method Detail

      • onMeetingNeedPasswordOrDisplayName

        void onMeetingNeedPasswordOrDisplayName(boolean needPassword,
                                        boolean needDisplayName,
                                        InMeetingEventHandler handler)
        Sink the event if the meeting needs a password or a screen name.
        Parameters:
        needPassword - TRUE means that the password is needed. FALSE not.
        needDisplayName - TRUE means that the screen name is needed. FALSE not.
        handler - This handler provides an interface to set password and name. The interface will be called once the user received the callback event.

      • onWebinarNeedRegister

        void onWebinarNeedRegister()
        During the webinar, this callback event will be triggered if the user needs to register.

      • onJoinWebinarNeedUserNameAndEmail

        void onJoinWebinarNeedUserNameAndEmail(InMeetingEventHandler handler)
        The function will be invoked when a user joins a webinar that needs username and email.
        Parameters:
        handler - Configure information or leave meeting via InMeetingEventHandler.setRegisterWebinarInfo(String, String, boolean).

      • onMeetingNeedColseOtherMeeting

        void onMeetingNeedColseOtherMeeting(InMeetingEventHandler handler)
        Sink the event that it is needed to close another ongoing meeting. A meeting is running on server, you need to close it before you can start a new one.
        Parameters:
        handler - End the meeting via InMeetingEventHandler.endOtherMeeting().

      • onMeetingFail

        void onMeetingFail(int errorCode,
                   int internalErrorCode)
        Sink the event of meeting starts failed or user joins meeting failed
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Meeting errors.
        internalErrorCode - Internal error code.

      • onMeetingLeaveComplete

        void onMeetingLeaveComplete(long ret)
        Sink the event that user has left meeting.
        Parameters:
        ret - Reasons for leaving meeting defined in MeetingEndReason.

      • onMeetingUserJoin

        void onMeetingUserJoin(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> userList)
        Sink the event of a new user joins the meeting.
        Parameters:
        userList - The list of user ID.

      • onMeetingUserLeave

        void onMeetingUserLeave(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> userList)
        Sink the event that user leaves the meeting.
        Parameters:
        userList - The list of user ID.

      • onMeetingUserUpdated

        void onMeetingUserUpdated(long userId)
        Sink the event that user's information in the meeting is upgraded.
        Parameters:
        userId - User ID.

      • onMeetingHostChanged

        void onMeetingHostChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that the host of meeting changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of user to be the host.

      • onMeetingCoHostChanged

        void onMeetingCoHostChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that meeting co-host changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of user to be co-host.

      • onActiveVideoUserChanged

        void onActiveVideoUserChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that the video of the active user changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of active user.

      • onActiveSpeakerVideoUserChanged

        void onActiveSpeakerVideoUserChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that the speaker of the active user changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of active user.

      • onSpotlightVideoChanged

        void onSpotlightVideoChanged(boolean on)
        Sink the event that the user video spotlight status changes.
        Parameters:
        on - TRUE means that spotlight mode is on, otherwise not.

      • onUserVideoStatusChanged

        void onUserVideoStatusChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that user's video status changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

      • onUserNetworkQualityChanged

        void onUserNetworkQualityChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that user's network quality changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

      • onMicrophoneStatusError

        void onMicrophoneStatusError(InMeetingAudioController.MobileRTCMicrophoneError error)
        Sink the event of user's microphone errors.
        Parameters:
        error - Error types defined in InMeetingAudioController.MobileRTCMicrophoneError.

      • onUserAudioStatusChanged

        void onUserAudioStatusChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that user's audio status changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

      • onHostAskUnMute

        void onHostAskUnMute(long userId)
        Sink the event that host ask unmute user's audio.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

        void onHostAskStartVideo(long userId)
        Sink the event that host ask unmute user's video.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

      • onUserAudioTypeChanged

        void onUserAudioTypeChanged(long userId)
        Sink the event that user's audio type changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

      • onMyAudioSourceTypeChanged

        void onMyAudioSourceTypeChanged(int type)
        Sink the event that the output type of the current user's audio source changes.
        Parameters:
        type - Audio types defined in AudioSourceType.

      • onLowOrRaiseHandStatusChanged

        void onLowOrRaiseHandStatusChanged(long userId,
                                   boolean isRaiseHand)
        Sink the event that the hand status changes.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.
        isRaiseHand - TRUE means raising hands. FALSE put hands down.

      • onMeetingSecureKeyNotification

        void onMeetingSecureKeyNotification(byte[] key)
        Sink the event that meeting needs session key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key currently in use.

      • onChatMessageReceived

        void onChatMessageReceived(InMeetingChatMessage msg)
        Sink the event that a new chat message is received.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message object.

      • onSilentModeChanged

        void onSilentModeChanged(boolean inSilentMode)
        user silent mode change callback
        Parameters:
        inSilentMode - True is in silent mode

      • onFreeMeetingReminder

        void onFreeMeetingReminder(boolean isHost,
                           boolean canUpgrade,
                           boolean isFirstGift)
        Inform user that free meeting will be ended in 10 minutes.
        Parameters:
        isHost - True means the original host of the current meeting, otherwise not.
        canUpgrade - True means the current meeting can be upgraded.
        isFirstGift - True means we will upgrade this free meeting automatically.

      • onMeetingActiveVideo

        void onMeetingActiveVideo(long userId)
        Sink the event that Active video user changed .
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.

      • onSinkAttendeeChatPriviledgeChanged

        void onSinkAttendeeChatPriviledgeChanged(int privilege)
        The function will be invoked when the chat privilege of attendees changes. only NORMAL MEETING(non webinar meeting) can get the callback.
        Parameters:
        privilege - current privilege The chat privilege of the current attendee.

      • onSinkAllowAttendeeChatNotification

        void onSinkAllowAttendeeChatNotification(int privilege)
        The function will be invoked when the chat privilege of attendees changes. only WEBINAR meeting can get the callback.
        Parameters:
        privilege - current privilege The chat privilege of the current attendee.
